text: Stephanie Adams (July 24, 1970 - May 18, 2018) was an American model and author. She was the Playboy Playmate for November 1992. Orange, New Jersey was her birth place but Adams grew up in New York.Jocelyn Voo, "Stephanie Adams: Honing Her Craft", Curve Magazine, April 2005. She was raised by two of her aunts Joyce and Pearl, former models who encouraged Adams to do modeling when she was 16. On May 18, 2018, Adams murdered her seven-year-old son and killed herself. The New York City Police Department says that she pushed her son out of a 25th-story balcony, before jumping herself. == Related pages == *List of gay, lesbian or bisexual people: A == References == == Other websites == *Stephanie Adams' official website * Category:Writers from New York (state) Category:1970 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Suicides by jumping in the United States Category:Writers from New Jersey Category:Models from New Jersey Category:People from Orange, New Jersey
title: Stephanie Adams
